headline.main: California Revamps Its Campaign Against Smoking

docs.lead_paragraph: Editors' Note: This newsletter is coming to you on Tuesday because of Martin Luther King's Birthday on Monday. Look for In Advertising next week on its regular day, Monday. It is easy to create advertising that sells a product. It is more difficult to create advertising that un-sells a behavior.
docs.snippet: Editors' Note: This newsletter is coming to you on Tuesday because of  Martin Luther King's Birthday on Monday. Look for In Advertising next week on its regular day, Monday.     It is easy to create advertising that sells a product. It is more...

headline.print_headline: California Revamps Its Campaign Against Smoking
headline.main: California Revamps Its Campaign Against Smoking

docs.lead_paragraph: New ads for the state’s public health department concentrate on three topics: secondhand smoke, countering the tobacco industry’s pro-smoking messages and cessation of smoking.
docs.snippet: New ads for the state’s public health department concentrate on three topics: secondhand smoke, countering the tobacco industry’s pro-smoking messages and cessation of smoking.

headline.print_headline: Shooting Suspect Had Been Known to Use Potent, and Legal, Hallucinogen
headline.seo: Tucson Shooting Suspect Was Known to Use Hallucinogen Salvia
headline.main: Shooting Suspect Had Been Known to Use Potent, and Legal, Hallucinogen

byline.original: By A. G. SULZBERGER and JENNIFER MEDINA

docs.lead_paragraph: Federal drug officials have warned that the typical effects of smoking salvia could closely mimic psychosis.
docs.snippet: Federal drug officials have warned that the typical effects of smoking salvia could closely mimic psychosis.

headline.print_headline: AGING: The Mediterranean Diet as Brain Food
headline.seo: Mediterranean Diet May Slow Cognitive Decline, Study Says
headline.main: Aging: Mediterranean Diet as Brain Food

docs.lead_paragraph: The Mediterranean diet — heavy on vegetables, fish and olive oil, with moderate amounts of wine — may be associated with slower rates of mental decline in the elderly.
docs.snippet: The Mediterranean diet — heavy on vegetables, fish and olive oil, with moderate amounts of wine — may be associated with slower rates of mental decline in the elderly.
